name: Exclusively Yours: An Office Affair
storyline: "We’re your fiances." Three of your fiances show up after you wake up in the hospital! However, you can't remember a single thing since you've lost all of your memories… Everything is a haze now due to you getting in an accident, and all you want to know is: who is your real fiance?
summary:
You're an executive assistant - starting today!
The charming, talented executives and a rival who shows up out of the blue - want to know: whose assistant do you want to be?

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Exclusively Yours: An Office Affair Prologue
